ISSUE.TITLE: 4.10 BETA - Warnings after initial install
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.10 Beta website: http://www.voogu.net Steps to reproduce the problem: - Pull code from GitHub - Build, Publish via WebDeploy to SmarterASP - Login nopCommerce as Admin - View warnings page **Warnings**: ``` You don't have active payment methods (This is marked as an error) 'DiscountRequirement.MustBeAssignedToCustomerRole' plugin is not compatible or cannot be loaded. 'Pickup.PickupInStore' plugin is not compatible or cannot be loaded. 'Shipping.FixedByWeightByTotal' plugin is not compatible or cannot be loaded.
